title: GENERAL
fullText:
The selection and installation of electrical equipment shall be such that the temperature characteristics of the electrical equipment, when properly installed and operated, do not adversely affect the electrical equipment, the electrical installation itself, or any other installation, whether electrical or not.
Adequate ventilation shall be provided, where necessary, in order to maintain operating temperatures within the rated or specified limits of the affected equipment if heat is generated in normal operation.
NOTE: Account should be taken of the influence that temperature might have on the operational or characteristic values of the electrical equipment.
